pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Versatile Data Kit Server PluginThis plugin facilitates installation of the Control Service in a local [Kind](https://kind.sigs.k8s.io/) cluster.### UsageTo use the plugin, just install it using:```bashpip install vdk-server```To install the Control Service:```bashvdk server --install```To remove revious installation:```bashvdk server --uninstall```
